sentences.sentence: They want the department of education to record which children are left-handed and what their educational attainments are, since they make up some 10% of the population.
sentences.translation: 他们希望教育部记录哪些孩子是左撇子以及这些孩子的受教育程度，因为这些孩子占人口的10%左右。

sentences.sentence: Appreciation of your high talents and literary attainments.
sentences.translation: 对你的出众才华和文学造诣的赏识。

sentences.sentence: Because of its natural artistic attainments, popular with the modern people like.
sentences.translation: 由于其天然艺术造诣，颇受现代人的喜欢。
